Text: It's great that you've taken the time to upload what looks like an amazing set, but what's with the one long track per disc?  That sucks!

Its not the first time people complain about FLaC img's with cue files... I wont go into a discussion about pros and cons. 

Suffice to say: If you load the .cue file into a compatible media player (VLC or WINamp) it will load the flac file as separate tracks just like when you load a CD.

If you prefer separate files there are several free flac tools that can split the flac img's for you. I can higly recommend cuetools: http://www.hydrogenaudio.org/forums/index.php?showtopic=66233
Thank you very much for this.
